reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: Finland-Vietnam Eco-Technology Transfer Promotion Project
PYM: Suomen ja Vietnamin välisen ekoteknologian viennin edistämishanke

description.narrative: (Will be added in Finnish later)Goal: Create a feasible local platform facilitating the transfer of Finnish technology to Vietnamese small and medium enterprises which will create a stepping stone to develop a sustainable structure for Finnish technology t ransfer to Vietnam. Objectives: 1) Facilitate two successful match-making cases for eco-technology transfer by November 2017 2) Create a nexus between Finnish and Vietnamese organizations thereby increasing joint activities among stakeholders from Apri l till October 2017 3) Create an ongoing trusted source of local experts by training and certifying 20 local consultants for technology transfer promotion skills with regards to Finnish technology by May 2017 Activities: 1) Collection and identification Finnish technology demand and supply data in fields of functional healthy food renewable energy solid waste treatment water solutions and agricultural products2) Technology Transfer Promotion activities in fields of functional healthy food renewable energy solid waste treatment water solutions and agricultural products3) Development of database and website for technology transfer promotion.4) Trainings for technology transfer promotion skills for local consultants and local SMEs

Goal: Create a feasible local platform facilitating the transfer of Finnish technology to Vietnamese small and medium enterprises which will create a stepping stone to develop a sustainable structure for Finnish technology transfer to Vietnam. Objectives: 1) Facilitate two successful match-making cases for eco-technology transfer by November 2017 2) Create a nexus between Finnish and Vietnamese organizations thereby increasing joint activities among stakeholders from April till October 2017 3) Create an ong oing trusted source of local experts by training and certifying 20 local consultants for technology transfer promotion skills with regards to Finnish technology by May 2017 Activities: 1) Collection and identification Finnish technology demand and supply d ata in fields of functional healthy food renewable energy solid waste treatment water solutions and agricultural products2) Technology Transfer Promotion activities in fields of functional healthy food renewable energy solid waste treatment water solutions and agricultural products3) Development of database and website for technology transfer promotion.4) Trainings for technology transfer promotion skills for local consultants and local SMEs

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is the main prio rity area in this activity
